column2: The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Norse culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Geats.
What will they think of next, I wonder.
column3: Je me demande quelle sera leur prochaine lubie.
column4: Ich frage mich, was sie sich wohl als Nächstes überlegen werden.
column6: Me pregunto qué será lo siguiente.

column2: Welcome into the fold, my Geat brothers and sisters.
